overview:
Tereza Nemessanyi is Co-Founder and CEO of Honestly Now.

Honestly Now is a Q&A social game which helps us make awesome personal decisions, together. Whether you choose to keep it private with your closest friends, or share it anonymously with the community, Honestly Now helps its members get to the bottom of life’s thorniest questions, fast.

Tereza is also author of the blog, “Mashups, Markets and Motherhood”, which explores the intersection of tech startups, innovation and parenting. In 2010 she wrote an Op Ed titled “XX Combinator”.
